content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to execute the Python file "authenticate_twitter_api.py," but it returned an error saying that the file did not exist. I was instructed to write the Twitter V2 API authentication code to a file named "authenticate_twitter_api.py" using the "write_to_file" command with the specified filename and text. As the user, I received a command to execute the Python file "authenticate_twitter_api.py" with the specified filename.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_python_file returned: {'title': 'Unauthorized', 'type': 'about:blank', 'status': 401, 'detail': 'Unauthorized'}\n"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt", "text": "# Twitter API credentials\\n\\nAPI_KEY = \\"your_api_key_here\\"\\nAPI_SECRET_KEY = \\"your_api_secret_key_here\\"\\nACCESS_TOKEN = \\"your_access_token_here\\"\\nACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET = \\"your_access_token_secret_here\\""}}}'}]
"""
